project.name: EdnSy Dashboard - Internal Metrics Platform
project.description: Comprehensive internal dashboard for monitoring Stripe billing, n8n workflows, Vonage communications, Retell AI, Digital Ocean, Google Cloud, Supabase, and user analytics.

tasks.title: Project Setup & Infrastructure
tasks.description: Initialize SvelteKit 5 dashboard with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, authentication, and basic project structure.
tasks.details: Set up the foundational dashboard application with the same tech stack as the landing project. This includes package.json, configuration files, basic routing, and project structure.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all configuration files are properly set up and the development server starts without errors.

subtasks.title: Initialize SvelteKit 5 Project
subtasks.description: Create new SvelteKit 5 project with TypeScript and Vite configuration.
subtasks.details: Set up package.json with all required dependencies including SvelteKit 5, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn-svelte, and additional dashboard-specific packages.

subtasks.title: Configure Tailwind CSS & Shadcn-svelte
subtasks.description: Set up Tailwind CSS 4.0 with Shadcn-svelte components and custom theme configuration.
subtasks.details: Configure tailwind.config.cjs, components.json, and set up the component library with dashboard-specific styling.

subtasks.title: Set Up TypeScript Configuration
subtasks.description: Configure TypeScript with strict mode and proper type checking for the dashboard.
subtasks.details: Set up tsconfig.json with strict type checking and proper path mappings for the dashboard structure.

subtasks.title: Create Project Directory Structure
subtasks.description: Establish the folder structure for components, services, types, and routes.
subtasks.details: Create src/lib structure with components, services, types, utils, and hooks directories. Set up routes structure for dashboard pages.

tasks.title: Authentication & Security Foundation
tasks.description: Implement secure authentication system with Supabase, role-based access control, and session management.
tasks.details: Build the authentication foundation using Supabase Auth with Google OAuth, implement role-based access control (Admin, Analyst, Developer, Viewer), and set up secure session management.
tasks.testStrategy: Test authentication flow, role permissions, session management, and security measures.

subtasks.title: Set Up Supabase Authentication
subtasks.description: Configure Supabase Auth with Google OAuth and user management.
subtasks.details: Set up Supabase client, configure Google OAuth, implement login/logout functionality, and user session management.

subtasks.title: Implement Role-Based Access Control
subtasks.description: Create role system with Admin, Analyst, Developer, and Viewer permissions.
subtasks.details: Define user roles and permissions, implement middleware for route protection, and create role-based UI components.

subtasks.title: Create Authentication UI Components
subtasks.description: Build login page, user profile, and authentication-related components.
subtasks.details: Create login page with Google OAuth, user profile component, and authentication state management.

subtasks.title: Implement Session Management
subtasks.description: Set up secure session handling with automatic logout and session validation.
subtasks.details: Implement session timeout, automatic logout, session validation middleware, and secure token handling.

tasks.title: Dashboard Layout & Navigation
tasks.description: Create responsive dashboard layout with navigation, sidebar, and main content area.
tasks.details: Build the main dashboard layout with responsive design, navigation sidebar, breadcrumbs, and customizable dashboard layouts per user role.
tasks.testStrategy: Test responsive design across devices, navigation functionality, and layout customization features.

subtasks.title: Create Main Dashboard Layout
subtasks.description: Build the primary dashboard layout with header, sidebar, and main content area.
subtasks.details: Create the main layout component with header (user info, notifications), sidebar (navigation), and main content area with proper responsive design.

subtasks.title: Implement Navigation Sidebar
subtasks.description: Create collapsible sidebar with navigation menu and role-based menu items.
subtasks.details: Build sidebar with navigation menu, role-based menu items, collapsible functionality, and active state indicators.

subtasks.title: Add Breadcrumb Navigation
subtasks.description: Implement breadcrumb navigation for deep linking and user orientation.
subtasks.details: Create breadcrumb component with dynamic navigation, deep linking support, and proper routing integration.

subtasks.title: Create Dashboard Homepage
subtasks.description: Build the main dashboard homepage with overview cards and quick access widgets.
subtasks.details: Create homepage with overview cards for key metrics, quick access widgets, and role-based dashboard customization.

tasks.title: Data Visualization Foundation
tasks.description: Set up Chart.js integration and create reusable chart components for metrics display.
tasks.details: Integrate Chart.js with Svelte, create reusable chart components (line, bar, pie, gauge charts), and set up real-time data visualization capabilities.
tasks.testStrategy: Test chart rendering, real-time updates, responsive behavior, and data accuracy.

subtasks.title: Integrate Chart.js with Svelte
subtasks.description: Set up Chart.js integration with Svelte components and TypeScript support.
subtasks.details: Install and configure Chart.js, create Svelte wrapper components, and set up TypeScript types for chart configurations.

subtasks.title: Create Reusable Chart Components
subtasks.description: Build reusable chart components for different chart types and data visualizations.
subtasks.details: Create components for line charts, bar charts, pie charts, gauge charts, and time series charts with proper props and event handling.

subtasks.title: Implement Real-time Chart Updates
subtasks.description: Set up WebSocket integration for real-time chart updates and data streaming.
subtasks.details: Implement WebSocket connections for real-time data updates, chart animation handling, and performance optimization.

subtasks.title: Create Dashboard Widgets
subtasks.description: Build reusable dashboard widgets for metrics display and data visualization.
subtasks.details: Create metric cards, stat widgets, progress indicators, and custom dashboard widgets with proper styling and responsiveness.

tasks.title: Stripe Billing Integration
tasks.description: Integrate Stripe API to display billing metrics, revenue tracking, and subscription analytics.
tasks.details: Integrate Stripe API to track revenue (MRR, ARR), subscription analytics, payment processing metrics, customer lifetime value, and billing cycle monitoring.
tasks.testStrategy: Test Stripe API integration, data accuracy, real-time updates, and billing metric calculations.

subtasks.title: Set Up Stripe API Integration
subtasks.description: Configure Stripe SDK and create API service for billing data retrieval.
subtasks.details: Install Stripe SDK, configure API keys, create service layer for Stripe API calls, and implement error handling.

subtasks.title: Create Revenue Tracking Dashboard
subtasks.description: Build dashboard for MRR, ARR, churn rate, and revenue analytics.
subtasks.details: Create revenue tracking components, implement MRR/ARR calculations, churn rate analytics, and revenue trend visualization.

subtasks.title: Implement Subscription Analytics
subtasks.description: Display active subscriptions, upgrades/downgrades, and subscription lifecycle metrics.
subtasks.details: Build subscription analytics dashboard, implement subscription lifecycle tracking, and create upgrade/downgrade analytics.

subtasks.title: Add Payment Processing Metrics
subtasks.description: Track payment success rates, disputes, and payment processing analytics.
subtasks.details: Create payment processing dashboard, implement success rate tracking, dispute monitoring, and payment analytics.

tasks.title: n8n Workflow Monitoring
tasks.description: Integrate n8n REST API to monitor workflow execution, performance, and error tracking.
tasks.details: Integrate n8n REST API to monitor workflow execution status, performance metrics, error tracking, execution time analytics, and resource usage monitoring.
tasks.testStrategy: Test n8n API integration, workflow monitoring accuracy, real-time updates, and error tracking functionality.

subtasks.title: Set Up n8n API Integration
subtasks.description: Configure n8n REST API client and create service for workflow data retrieval.
subtasks.details: Set up n8n API client, configure authentication, create service layer for workflow data, and implement error handling.

subtasks.title: Create Workflow Execution Dashboard
subtasks.description: Build dashboard for workflow execution status, performance, and real-time monitoring.
subtasks.details: Create workflow execution dashboard, implement real-time status updates, performance metrics display, and execution history.

subtasks.title: Implement Error Tracking & Alerting
subtasks.description: Set up error tracking, alerting system, and workflow failure monitoring.
subtasks.details: Implement error tracking system, create alerting mechanisms, workflow failure monitoring, and error analytics dashboard.

subtasks.title: Add Workflow Analytics
subtasks.description: Display execution time analytics, resource usage, and workflow dependencies.
subtasks.details: Create workflow analytics dashboard, implement execution time tracking, resource usage monitoring, and dependency visualization.

tasks.title: Vonage Communications Integration
tasks.description: Integrate Vonage API to monitor call quality, usage tracking, and communication metrics.
tasks.details: Integrate Vonage API to track call quality metrics, usage analytics (minutes, messages, API calls), cost monitoring, error rates, and geographic usage patterns.
tasks.testStrategy: Test Vonage API integration, call quality metrics accuracy, usage tracking, and cost monitoring functionality.

subtasks.title: Set Up Vonage API Integration
subtasks.description: Configure Vonage SDK and create service for communication data retrieval.
subtasks.details: Install Vonage SDK, configure API credentials, create service layer for Vonage API calls, and implement error handling.

subtasks.title: Create Call Quality Dashboard
subtasks.description: Build dashboard for call quality metrics, performance analytics, and quality monitoring.
subtasks.details: Create call quality dashboard, implement quality metrics tracking, performance analytics, and real-time quality monitoring.

subtasks.title: Implement Usage Tracking
subtasks.description: Track minutes, messages, API calls, and usage analytics.
subtasks.details: Create usage tracking dashboard, implement usage analytics, cost monitoring per service, and usage pattern analysis.

subtasks.title: Add Geographic Usage Analytics
subtasks.description: Display geographic usage patterns and regional analytics.
subtasks.details: Create geographic analytics dashboard, implement regional usage tracking, and geographic pattern visualization.

tasks.title: Retell AI Integration
tasks.description: Integrate Retell AI API to monitor AI model performance, response times, and usage analytics.
tasks.details: Integrate Retell AI API to track AI model performance metrics, response time analytics, usage patterns, cost tracking, error rates, and model accuracy.
tasks.testStrategy: Test Retell AI API integration, performance metrics accuracy, response time tracking, and usage analytics functionality.

subtasks.title: Set Up Retell AI API Integration
subtasks.description: Configure Retell AI API client and create service for AI metrics retrieval.
subtasks.details: Set up Retell AI API client, configure authentication, create service layer for AI metrics, and implement error handling.

subtasks.title: Create AI Performance Dashboard
subtasks.description: Build dashboard for AI model performance, response times, and accuracy metrics.
subtasks.details: Create AI performance dashboard, implement response time tracking, accuracy metrics, and performance analytics.

subtasks.title: Implement Usage & Cost Tracking
subtasks.description: Track AI usage patterns, cost monitoring, and usage analytics.
subtasks.details: Create usage tracking dashboard, implement cost monitoring, usage pattern analysis, and cost optimization insights.

subtasks.title: Add Model Accuracy Analytics
subtasks.description: Display model accuracy tracking and performance analytics.
subtasks.details: Create accuracy analytics dashboard, implement accuracy tracking, performance monitoring, and accuracy trend analysis.

tasks.title: Digital Ocean Infrastructure Monitoring
tasks.description: Integrate Digital Ocean API to monitor server performance, network traffic, and infrastructure metrics.
tasks.details: Integrate Digital Ocean API to track server performance metrics (CPU, RAM, disk), network traffic monitoring, cost tracking per droplet/service, uptime monitoring, and resource utilization optimization.
tasks.testStrategy: Test Digital Ocean API integration, server metrics accuracy, cost tracking, and infrastructure monitoring functionality.

subtasks.title: Set Up Digital Ocean API Integration
subtasks.description: Configure Digital Ocean API client and create service for infrastructure data retrieval.
subtasks.details: Set up Digital Ocean API client, configure authentication, create service layer for infrastructure data, and implement error handling.

subtasks.title: Create Server Performance Dashboard
subtasks.description: Build dashboard for CPU, RAM, disk usage, and server performance metrics.
subtasks.details: Create server performance dashboard, implement resource monitoring, performance analytics, and real-time server metrics.

subtasks.title: Implement Network Traffic Monitoring
subtasks.description: Track network traffic, bandwidth usage, and network performance analytics.
subtasks.details: Create network monitoring dashboard, implement traffic analytics, bandwidth tracking, and network performance metrics.

subtasks.title: Add Cost & Resource Optimization
subtasks.description: Display cost tracking per droplet/service and resource utilization optimization.
subtasks.details: Create cost tracking dashboard, implement resource utilization monitoring, cost optimization insights, and resource allocation analytics.

tasks.title: Google Cloud Console Integration
tasks.description: Integrate Google Cloud APIs to monitor service usage, cost optimization, and cloud performance metrics.
tasks.details: Integrate Google Cloud APIs to track service usage across all Google Cloud products, cost optimization recommendations, performance metrics for cloud services, security monitoring, and compliance tracking.
tasks.testStrategy: Test Google Cloud API integration, service usage tracking, cost monitoring, and cloud performance metrics accuracy.

subtasks.title: Set Up Google Cloud API Integration
subtasks.description: Configure Google Cloud APIs and create service for cloud metrics retrieval.
subtasks.details: Set up Google Cloud API client, configure service account authentication, create service layer for cloud metrics, and implement error handling.

subtasks.title: Create Service Usage Dashboard
subtasks.description: Build dashboard for Google Cloud service usage across all products and services.
subtasks.details: Create service usage dashboard, implement usage tracking across all Google Cloud services, and service-specific analytics.

subtasks.title: Implement Cost Optimization Analytics
subtasks.description: Track cost optimization recommendations and cloud spending analytics.
subtasks.details: Create cost optimization dashboard, implement cost tracking, optimization recommendations, and spending analytics.

subtasks.title: Add Security & Compliance Monitoring
subtasks.description: Display security monitoring, compliance tracking, and cloud security analytics.
subtasks.details: Create security monitoring dashboard, implement compliance tracking, security analytics, and compliance reporting.

tasks.title: Supabase Database Analytics
tasks.description: Integrate Supabase API to monitor database performance, query analytics, and storage usage.
tasks.details: Integrate Supabase API to track database performance metrics, query analytics and optimization, storage usage tracking, authentication metrics, and real-time connection monitoring.
tasks.testStrategy: Test Supabase API integration, database metrics accuracy, query analytics, and storage monitoring functionality.

subtasks.title: Set Up Supabase Analytics Integration
subtasks.description: Configure Supabase API client and create service for database analytics retrieval.
subtasks.details: Set up Supabase API client, configure authentication, create service layer for database analytics, and implement error handling.

subtasks.title: Create Database Performance Dashboard
subtasks.description: Build dashboard for database performance metrics, query performance, and database health monitoring.
subtasks.details: Create database performance dashboard, implement query performance tracking, database health monitoring, and performance analytics.

subtasks.title: Implement Query Analytics
subtasks.description: Track query analytics, optimization insights, and query performance monitoring.
subtasks.details: Create query analytics dashboard, implement query tracking, performance optimization insights, and query analytics.

subtasks.title: Add Storage & Authentication Metrics
subtasks.description: Display storage usage tracking and authentication metrics analytics.
subtasks.details: Create storage monitoring dashboard, implement authentication metrics tracking, storage analytics, and authentication analytics.

tasks.title: User Analytics & Engagement
tasks.description: Implement user analytics tracking, engagement metrics, and user behavior analysis.
tasks.details: Implement user analytics tracking for user engagement metrics, feature usage tracking, conversion funnel analysis, user retention rates, and support ticket analytics.
tasks.testStrategy: Test user analytics tracking, engagement metrics accuracy, conversion funnel analysis, and user behavior tracking functionality.

subtasks.title: Set Up User Analytics Tracking
subtasks.description: Configure user analytics system and create service for user data collection and analysis.
subtasks.details: Set up user analytics tracking system, configure data collection, create service layer for user analytics, and implement privacy-compliant tracking.

subtasks.title: Create User Engagement Dashboard
subtasks.description: Build dashboard for user engagement metrics, feature usage, and user behavior analytics.
subtasks.details: Create user engagement dashboard, implement engagement tracking, feature usage analytics, and user behavior monitoring.

subtasks.title: Implement Conversion Funnel Analysis
subtasks.description: Track conversion funnels, user journey analysis, and conversion optimization insights.
subtasks.details: Create conversion funnel dashboard, implement funnel tracking, user journey analysis, and conversion optimization analytics.

subtasks.title: Add User Retention Analytics
subtasks.description: Display user retention rates, cohort analysis, and retention optimization insights.
subtasks.details: Create retention analytics dashboard, implement retention tracking, cohort analysis, and retention optimization insights.

tasks.title: Alerting & Notification System
tasks.description: Implement configurable alerts, multi-channel notifications, and escalation rules for all metrics.
tasks.details: Build comprehensive alerting system with configurable alerts for all metrics, multi-channel notifications (email, Slack, SMS), escalation rules for critical issues, alert history management, and snooze functionality.
tasks.testStrategy: Test alert configuration, notification delivery, escalation rules, alert history, and snooze functionality across all channels.

subtasks.title: Create Alert Configuration System
subtasks.description: Build alert configuration interface and alert rule management system.
subtasks.details: Create alert configuration dashboard, implement alert rule management, threshold configuration, and alert condition setup.

subtasks.title: Implement Multi-channel Notifications
subtasks.description: Set up email, Slack, and SMS notification delivery systems.
subtasks.details: Implement email notifications, Slack integration, SMS notifications, and notification delivery tracking.

subtasks.title: Add Escalation Rules & Alert History
subtasks.description: Implement escalation rules for critical issues and alert history management.
subtasks.details: Create escalation rule system, implement alert history tracking, alert management interface, and escalation workflow.

subtasks.title: Implement Snooze & Alert Management
subtasks.description: Add snooze functionality and comprehensive alert management features.
subtasks.details: Implement alert snooze functionality, alert management interface, alert status tracking, and alert response workflows.

tasks.title: Reporting & Analytics System
tasks.description: Build scheduled reports, custom report builder, and export capabilities for comprehensive analytics.
tasks.details: Create comprehensive reporting system with scheduled reports (daily, weekly, monthly), custom report builder with drag-and-drop interface, export capabilities (PDF, CSV, Excel), report sharing and collaboration, and historical data analysis.
tasks.testStrategy: Test report generation, custom report builder, export functionality, report sharing, and historical data analysis accuracy.

subtasks.title: Create Scheduled Reports System
subtasks.description: Build scheduled report generation and delivery system.
subtasks.details: Create scheduled report system, implement report generation, automated delivery, and report scheduling interface.

subtasks.title: Build Custom Report Builder
subtasks.description: Implement drag-and-drop report builder with custom analytics capabilities.
subtasks.details: Create custom report builder, implement drag-and-drop interface, custom analytics, and report template system.

subtasks.title: Add Export & Sharing Capabilities
subtasks.description: Implement PDF, CSV, Excel export and report sharing functionality.
subtasks.details: Implement export functionality (PDF, CSV, Excel), report sharing system, collaboration features, and export tracking.

subtasks.title: Create Historical Data Analysis
subtasks.description: Build historical data analysis and trend reporting capabilities.
subtasks.details: Create historical data analysis dashboard, implement trend analysis, historical reporting, and data comparison features.

tasks.title: Performance Optimization & Testing
tasks.description: Optimize dashboard performance, implement comprehensive testing, and ensure reliability standards.
tasks.details: Implement performance optimization for dashboard loads (< 2 seconds), chart rendering (< 1 second), API calls (< 500ms), real-time updates (< 100ms), comprehensive testing, and reliability standards (99.9% uptime).
tasks.testStrategy: Test performance benchmarks, load testing, error handling, and reliability standards across all dashboard features.

subtasks.title: Implement Performance Optimization
subtasks.description: Optimize dashboard performance, chart rendering, and API response times.
subtasks.details: Implement performance optimization, caching strategies, lazy loading, and response time optimization.

subtasks.title: Create Comprehensive Test Suite
subtasks.description: Build unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end testing for all dashboard features.
subtasks.details: Create comprehensive test suite, implement unit tests, integration tests, end-to-end tests, and automated testing.

subtasks.title: Implement Error Handling & Recovery
subtasks.description: Set up graceful error handling, error recovery, and system resilience.
subtasks.details: Implement error handling, error recovery, system resilience, and graceful degradation.

subtasks.title: Add Monitoring & Observability
subtasks.description: Implement dashboard monitoring, logging, and observability tools.
subtasks.details: Create monitoring system, implement logging, observability tools, and performance monitoring.

tasks.title: Security Audit & Compliance
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive security audit, implement compliance measures, and ensure data protection standards.
tasks.details: Conduct comprehensive security audit, implement HTTPS encryption, API key management with rotation, rate limiting, input validation, SQL injection prevention, XSS protection, and compliance tracking.
tasks.testStrategy: Test security measures, compliance requirements, data protection, and security audit results.

subtasks.title: Conduct Security Audit
subtasks.description: Perform comprehensive security audit and vulnerability assessment.
subtasks.details: Conduct security audit, vulnerability assessment, penetration testing, and security review.

subtasks.title: Implement Security Measures
subtasks.description: Set up HTTPS encryption, API key management, and security protections.
subtasks.details: Implement HTTPS encryption, API key management, rate limiting, input validation, and security protections.

subtasks.title: Add Compliance Tracking
subtasks.description: Implement compliance monitoring and regulatory requirement tracking.
subtasks.details: Create compliance tracking system, implement regulatory monitoring, compliance reporting, and audit trails.

subtasks.title: Create Data Protection Measures
subtasks.description: Implement data protection, privacy controls, and data security measures.
subtasks.details: Implement data protection, privacy controls, data encryption, and data security measures.

tasks.title: Documentation & Training
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation, user training materials, and deployment guides.
tasks.details: Create comprehensive documentation including API documentation, user guides, admin documentation, deployment guides, troubleshooting guides, and user training materials.
tasks.testStrategy: Review documentation completeness, user training effectiveness, and deployment guide accuracy.

subtasks.title: Create Technical Documentation
subtasks.description: Write API documentation, deployment guides, and technical specifications.
subtasks.details: Create API documentation, deployment guides, technical specifications, and architecture documentation.

subtasks.title: Build User Training Materials
subtasks.description: Create user guides, video tutorials, and interactive training materials.
subtasks.details: Create user guides, video tutorials, interactive training, and user onboarding materials.

subtasks.title: Write Admin Documentation
subtasks.description: Create admin guides, configuration documentation, and troubleshooting guides.
subtasks.details: Create admin guides, configuration documentation, troubleshooting guides, and maintenance procedures.

subtasks.title: Prepare Deployment Materials
subtasks.description: Create deployment guides, production setup, and launch procedures.
subtasks.details: Create deployment guides, production setup procedures, launch checklists, and deployment automation.

tasks.title: Production Deployment
tasks.description: Deploy dashboard to production environment with monitoring, backup, and disaster recovery procedures.
tasks.details: Deploy dashboard to production environment with comprehensive monitoring, automated backups, disaster recovery procedures (4-hour RTO, 1-hour RPO), and production optimization.
tasks.testStrategy: Test production deployment, monitoring systems, backup procedures, and disaster recovery processes.

subtasks.title: Set Up Production Environment
subtasks.description: Configure production environment, monitoring, and deployment pipeline.
subtasks.details: Set up production environment, configure monitoring, implement deployment pipeline, and production optimization.

subtasks.title: Implement Monitoring & Backup
subtasks.description: Set up comprehensive monitoring, automated backups, and health checks.
subtasks.details: Implement monitoring systems, automated backups, health checks, and production monitoring.

subtasks.title: Create Disaster Recovery Plan
subtasks.description: Implement disaster recovery procedures and backup verification.
subtasks.details: Create disaster recovery plan, implement backup verification, recovery procedures, and disaster recovery testing.

subtasks.title: Launch & Post-Launch Support
subtasks.description: Execute production launch and provide post-launch support and monitoring.
subtasks.details: Execute production launch, provide post-launch support, monitor system health, and address launch issues.
